metadata.title: CVE-2017-9773 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Denial of Service was found in Horde_Image 2.x before 2.5.0 via a craftedURL to the "Null" image driver.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9773` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-horde-image - 2.5.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-horde-image package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1').
